item.title: 决策指南：瑞典和挪威可能跟随美联储暂缓加息

item.description: 2019 年，委内瑞拉经济危机最糟糕时期的不愉快回忆再次出现：滚动停电、三位数的通货膨胀和外汇紧缩。【原文：Unwelcome reminders from the worst days of Venezuela’s economic crisis in 2019 are starting to crop up once again: rolling blackouts, triple-digit inflation and a foreign currency crunch.】
